page.title: 04CHILDREN'S FAVOURITE TOYS
page.content: SOME OF OUR FAVOURITE TOYS ARE : {LEGO }LEGO IS COLOURED PLASTIC BLOCKS WITH BUMPS ON TOP.THEY ARE DIFFERENT SIZES AND CAN BE FITTED TOGETHER TO MAKE BUILDINGS,VEHICLES AND LOTS OF OTHER THINGS. {BMX }IS ENTERTAMENT FOR ALL AGES.IT IS A BIKE WITH A STEEL FRAME AND TWO WHEELS. IT IS USED FOR TRICKS, STUNTS AND RACING WHICH WE DO ON A BMX TRACK. WHEELIES ARE WHEN YOU GO ALONG ON ONE WHEEL. AN ENDO IS WHEN YOU STOP AND GO ON YOUR FRONT WHEEL. {T.C.R.}STANDS FOR TOTAL CONTROL RACING.IT DOESN'T HAVE A GROOVE FOR THE CARS TO RUN IN.THE CARS ARE ABOUT 13 CM LONG.THE TRACK IS MADE OF HARD PLASTIC WITH FOUR ELECTRIC RAILS.THERE IS ENOUGH ROOM TO RACE TWO CARS SIDE BY SIDE.
